Hello Mike,

My name is Ian and I will be assisting you with your case.

Subject: Configure NEA After File Server Change    [ ref:!00D70091pB.!500Qk0NCWJs:ref ]

TextBody:
Hello Mike,

Thank you for taking the time to meet today.

Today we:
Reconfigured your FileServer list to scan only the NAS01 server and removed the SAN01 and SAN02 servers.
We validated that your jobs were setup to run against the new servers.
We ran test FSAA and FSAC jobs and validated that they connection to the server worked and that data was imported.
We validated that AIC sees the new server and can see the new data that was scanned.


I am glad that we were able to get your issue resolved. The following is a summary of the ticket for your records.

Symptom
Assistance replacing DFS servers with new NAS01 server in Enterprise Auditor.


Resolution
Reconfigured your FileServer list to scan only the NAS01 server and removed the SAN01 and SAN02 servers.
We validated that your jobs were setup to run against the new server.
We ran test FSAA and FSAC jobs and validated that they connection to the server worked and that data was imported.
We validated that AIC sees the new server and can see the new data that was scanned.

Following this email, you will receive an automated confirmation that the case is closed, along with the ability to re-open the case if any related errors return. In addition, you will also receive a separate email with a survey where you can let us know how we did. Feel free to leave any feedback via the survey link!

Thank you,
Ian Ranstrom
Senior Technical Support Engineer
__________________ _________
Powerful Data Security Made Easy
6160 Warren Parkway, Suite 100, Frisco, TX 75034
www.netwrix.com
